name: Please select the completion date of the BitSight Assessment
Please select the renewal date for the next assessment
Hidden question for 'On Hold' that triggers IT Assessment Confirmation for process to proceed further.
Please select the inherent Information Security Risk level of the supplier.
Approval Status of IT Supplier based on Information Security Assessment result
helpText:
• Approved = approved without any findings or minor risk findings that can to be closed within the next audit interval

• Approved with findings = medium risk findings identified, and remediation measure must be closed within the project onboarding phase; supplier can be onboarded already

• On hold = high risk findings identified and CAPA plan must be set up; CAPA closure needs to take place before supplier can be created in SAP; please provide comments; process will be on hold in ORO system; go back to ORO once results are available and update status to “Approved”, “Approved with findings” or “Rejected”.

• Rejected = high risk findings identified and supplier is not able or willing to close them; please provide comments and click on “Deny”; process is stopped; requester and procurement will be informed; supplier will not be created in SAP.

name: If you want to reject the Bitsight Assessment, please use the 'Deny' option
description:
"

If you want to reject the Bitsight Assessment, please use the 'Deny' option
